column4: Hi Ubuntu users, I read the web infor Ubotto referred me to but cannot see how it is relevant to my problem with GNUnet. Can you help me setup and run GNUnet. I have installed this P2P program using Synaptic Package Manager and run the start the configuration wizard but GNUnet doesn't do anything. I don't know where to start. I've read all the info on the GNUnet and Ubuntu websites but they haven't helped. I'm not a programmer o
r developer. I just want to use GNUnet the way I use Torrent for P2P file sharing. Synaptic installed al
l the necessary files okay.  The setup wizard seemed to work but it failed to update the GNUnet program.
you are using gnunet-fuse ?
No
you have tried to play with gnunet-dbg ?
I think that there is also a gui for the debuger ^^
yes I am using gnunetfuse It its installed okay but I don't know what it does.
I'm not a developer and I don't know how to run the debug
ahh
let me try to start it up and run it
thanks . I have it running on aanother computer next to me if that helps.
I just installed gnunet-gtk-dev and it is working great what are you tring to do on the network ?
that set up everything for me nice and clean server and also clients and all that jazz not sure if that helps but good luck
I'll b happy if I can get it to do anything. the tabs work but the search for exampel doesn't find any keyword at all.
you have added stuff to your network ? meaning that you are using gnunet to host torrents not search for them correct ?
Does gnunet download torrent files or other files. Whenever I download torrents, BitTorrent does it okay.
No I haven't tried to publish anythign to gnunet. I can't find the network. I joined them by siigning up on the web.
see PM
I don't know what you mean by PM
